perks.name: Hands-On
perks.description: Gain bonus Super energy on melee kills.

perks.name: Ashes to Assets

perks.name: Dynamo
perks.description: Reduces Super cooldown when using your class ability near enemies.

perks.name: Trace Rifle Ammo Finder

perks.name: Focusing Strike
perks.description: Grants class ability energy when you cause damage with a melee attack.

perks.name: Overload Submachine Gun
perks.description:
Uninterrupted fire from your equipped SMGs grants bullets that stun combatants, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

perks.name: Anti-Barrier Scout Rifle
perks.description:
Scout Rifles you are wielding fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

Scout Rifles deal bonus damage against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

perks.name: Unstoppable Sidearm
perks.description:
Aiming down sights with any Sidearm you are wielding loads a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants.

Strong against [Stagger]  Unstoppable Champions.

perks.name: Overload Hand Cannon
perks.description: Landing consecutive hits disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

perks.name: Anti-Barrier Auto Rifle
perks.description:
Auto Rifles you are wielding fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

Auto Rifles deal bonus damage against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

perks.name: Scout Rifle Loader
perks.description: Increases reload speed of Scout Rifles.

perks.name: Grenade Launcher Dexterity
perks.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Grenade Launchers.

perks.name: Rocket Launcher Loader
perks.description: Increases reload speed of Rocket Launchers.

perks.name: Unstoppable Grenade Launcher
perks.description:
When you ready or reload a Grenade Launcher, for a short period, that weapon stuns Unstoppable Champions.

Strong against [Stagger]  Unstoppable Champions.

perks.name: Impulse Recycler
perks.description: Grenade final blows grant grenade energy. Multiple copies of this mod increase the amount of energy gained.

perks.name: Arc Damage Resistance
perks.description: Reduces incoming Arc damage from combatants.

perks.name: Melee Damage Resistance
perks.description: Reduces incoming damage from combatants that are at point-blank range.

perks.name: Solar Damage Resistance
perks.description: Reduces incoming Solar damage from combatants.

perks.name: Concussive Dampener
perks.description: Reduces incoming area-of-effect damage from combatants.

perks.name: Void Damage Resistance
perks.description: Reduces incoming Void damage from combatants.

perks.name: Sniper Damage Resistance
perks.description: Reduces incoming damage from combatants that are at long range.

perks.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Auto Rifles.

perks.name: Unflinching Pulse Rifle Aim
perks.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Pulse Rifles.

perks.name: Enhanced Unflinching Auto Rifle Aim
perks.description: Greatly reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Auto Rifles.

perks.name: Recuperation
perks.description: Replenishes health each time you pick up an Orb of Power.

perks.name: Better Already
perks.description: Your health begins to regenerate immediately after picking up an Orb of Power.

perks.name: Innervation
perks.description: Reduces grenade cooldown each time you pick up an Orb of Power.

perks.name: Invigoration
perks.description: Reduces melee cooldown each time you pick up an Orb of Power.

perks.name: Insulation
perks.description: Reduces class ability cooldown each time you pick up an Orb of Power.

perks.name: Absolution
perks.description: Reduces all ability cooldowns each time you pick up an Orb of Power.

perks.name: Traction
perks.description: Grants tighter turn radius while sprinting.

perks.name: Auto Rifle Scavenger
perks.description: Auto Rifles get bonus reserves when you pick up ammo.

perks.name: Arrow Scavenger
perks.description: Bows get bonus reserves when you pick up ammo.

perks.name: Fusion Rifle Scavenger
perks.description: Fusion Rifles get bonus reserves when you pick up Special ammo.

perks.name: Grenade Launcher Scavenger
perks.description: Grenade Launchers get bonus reserves when you pick up ammo.

perks.name: Hand Cannon Scavenger
perks.description: Hand Cannons get bonus reserves when you pick up ammo.

perks.name: Linear Fusion Rifle Scavenger
perks.description: Linear Fusion Rifles get bonus reserves when you pick up ammo.

perks.name: Machine Gun Scavenger
perks.description: Machine Guns get bonus reserves when you pick up ammo.

perks.name: Pulse Rifle Scavenger
perks.description: Pulse Rifles get bonus reserves when you pick up ammo.

perks.name: Rocket Launcher Scavenger
perks.description: Rocket Launchers get bonus reserves when you pick up ammo.

perks.name: Scout Rifle Scavenger
perks.description: Scout Rifles get bonus reserves when you pick up ammo.

perks.name: Shotgun Scavenger
perks.description: Shotguns get bonus reserves when you pick up Special ammo.

perks.name: Sidearm Scavenger
perks.description: Sidearms get bonus reserves when you pick up ammo.

perks.name: Sniper Rifle Scavenger
perks.description: Sniper Rifles get bonus reserves when you pick up Special ammo.

perks.name: Submachine Gun Scavenger
perks.description: Submachine Guns get bonus reserves when you pick up ammo.

perks.name: Sword Scavenger
perks.description: Swords get bonus reserves when you pick up ammo.

perks.name: Trace Rifle Scavenger
perks.description: Trace Rifles get bonus reserves when you pick up Special ammo.

perks.name: Grenade Launcher Scavenger
perks.description: Grenade Launchers get bonus reserves when you pick up ammo.

perks.name: Distribution
perks.description: Reduces all ability cooldowns when using your class ability near enemies.

perks.name: Perpetuation
perks.description: Reduces class ability cooldown when using your class ability.

perks.name: Outreach
perks.description: Reduces melee cooldown when using your class ability.

perks.name: Bomber
perks.description: Reduces grenade cooldown when using your class ability.

perks.name: Bulwark Finisher
perks.description: Finisher final blows generate an overshield. Requires one-fourth of your Super energy.

perks.name: Explosive Finisher
perks.description: Finishers restore grenades. Requires one-fifth of your Super energy.

perks.name: Healthy Finisher
perks.description: Finishers heal you. Requires one-tenth of your Super energy.

perks.name: One-Two Finisher
perks.description: Finishers restore melee abilities.  Requires one-sixth of your Super energy.

perks.name: Snapload Finisher
perks.description: Finishers generate Primary ammo and reload all your weapons. Requires one-tenth of your Super energy.

perks.name: Special Finisher
perks.description: Finishers generate Special ammo for the whole fireteam. Requires one-third of your Super energy.

perks.name: Utility Finisher
perks.description: Finishers restore class abilities. Requires one-tenth of your Super energy.

perks.name: Sundering Blast
perks.description: Stunning a Champion creates an explosive blast.

perks.name: Surge Detonators
perks.description:
Arc grenades disrupt combatants, stunning them, delaying ability regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

perks.name: Schwarzschild Condenser
perks.description:
Void melee abilities [Stagger] stun unshielded combatants.

Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

perks.name: Breach and Clear
perks.description: When using a Grenade Launcher, damaging a boss, damaging a Champion, or breaking a combatant's shield reloads your stowed weapons and causes the combatant to take increased damage for a short duration.

perks.name: Glacial Inheritance
perks.description: Defeating targets with your Stasis Super refunds Super energy.

perks.name: Energy Accelerant
perks.description: Your Dragonfly, Chain Reaction, and Firefly explosions deal more damage.

perks.name: Taking Charge
perks.description: Become Charged with Light by picking up Orbs of Power.

perks.name: Shield Break Charge
perks.description: Become Charged with Light by breaking a combatant shield with the matching energy type.

perks.name: Empowered Finish
perks.description: Become Charged with Light by finishing a combatant, consuming one-tenth of your Super energy.

perks.name: High-Energy Fire
perks.description: While Charged with Light, gain a bonus to weapon damage. Each defeated combatant consumes one stack of Charged with Light.

1484685884.name: Quick Charge
1484685884.tooltip: This mod's secondary perk is active when at least one other Arc mod is socketed into this armor, or when at least one other Arc Charged With Light mod is socketed into another piece of armor you are wearing.

perks.name: Quick Charge
perks.description: Become Charged with Light by rapidly defeating multiple combatants with Fusion Rifles or Shotguns.

perks.name: Ever Ready
perks.description: Greatly increases the ready speed of Fusion Rifles, Shotguns, Submachine Guns, and Swords.

1484685885.name: Striking Light
1484685885.tooltip: This mod's secondary perk is active when at least one other Arc mod is socketed into this armor, or when at least one other Arc Charged With Light mod is socketed into another piece of armor you are wearing.

perks.name: Striking Light
perks.description: While Charged with Light, defeating combatants with melee damage and Swords spawns 1 Orb of Power for your allies and consumes one stack of Charged with Light.

perks.name: Uncatchable
perks.description: Gain damage resistance against combatants while sprinting.

1484685886.name: Heavy Handed
1484685886.tooltip: This mod's secondary perk is active when at least one other Arc mod is socketed into this armor, or when at least one other Arc Charged With Light mod is socketed into another piece of armor you are wearing.

perks.name: Heavy Handed
perks.description: While Charged with Light, regain half of your melee energy when you use a charged melee ability, consuming one stack of Charged with Light.

perks.name: Lock and Load
perks.description: While surrounded by multiple combatants, defeating a combatant with a Fusion Rifle, Shotgun, Sidearm, or Submachine Gun adds ammo for that weapon to your reserves.

1484685887.name: Powerful Friends
1484685887.tooltip: This mod's secondary perk is active when at least one other Arc mod is socketed into this armor, or when at least one other Arc Charged With Light mod is socketed into another piece of armor you are wearing.

perks.name: Powerful Friends
perks.description: When you become Charged with Light, nearby allies also become Charged with Light, if they are not already.

perks.name: Stat Increase
perks.description: +20 Mobility ▲

3185435909.name: Heal Thyself
3185435909.tooltip: This mod's effects stack with other copies of this mod.

perks.name: Heal Thyself
perks.description: While you are Charged with Light, grenade final blows heal you and consume one stack of Charged with Light.

3185435908.name: Firepower
3185435908.tooltip: This mod's effects stack with other copies of this mod.

perks.name: Firepower
perks.description: While Charged with Light, regain a portion of your grenade energy when you use your grenade, consuming one stack of Charged with Light.

3185435911.name: Blast Radius
3185435911.tooltip: This mod's effects stack with other copies of this mod.

perks.name: Blast Radius
perks.description: Become Charged with Light by rapidly defeating multiple combatants with Grenade Launchers or Rocket Launchers.

3185435910.name: Charged Up
3185435910.tooltip: This mod's effects stack with other copies of this mod.

perks.name: Charged Up
perks.description: Allows for 1 additional stack of Charged with Light.

3523075120.name: Protective Light
3523075120.tooltip: This mod imposes a stat penalty when socketed in exchange for a reduced energy cost.

perks.name: Protective Light
perks.description: While Charged with Light, you gain significant damage resistance against combatants when your shields are destroyed. This effect consumes all stacks of Charged with Light. The more stacks consumed, the longer the damage resistance lasts.

perks.name: Stat Penalty
perks.description: -10 Strength ▼

3523075121.name: Extra Reserves
3523075121.tooltip: This mod imposes a stat penalty when socketed in exchange for a reduced energy cost.

perks.name: Extra Reserves
perks.description: While Charged with Light, defeating combatants with Void damage grants a chance to drop Special ammo. This effect consumes all stacks of Charged with Light. The more stacks you have, the higher your chance of gaining the ammo drop.

perks.name: Stat Penalty
perks.description: -10 Intellect ▼

3523075122.name: Precisely Charged
3523075122.tooltip: This mod imposes a stat penalty when socketed in exchange for a reduced energy cost.

perks.name: Precisely Charged
perks.description: Become Charged with Light by getting multiple rapid precision final blows with Linear Fusion Rifles or Sniper Rifles.

perks.name: Stat Penalty
perks.description: -10 Discipline ▼

3523075123.name: Stacks on Stacks
3523075123.tooltip: This mod imposes a stat penalty when socketed in exchange for a reduced energy cost.

perks.name: Stacks on Stacks
perks.description: Gain an extra stack of Charged with Light for every stack you gain.

perks.name: Stat Penalty
perks.description: -10 Recovery ▼

179977572.name: Global Reach
179977572.tooltip: Defeating a combatant with a Seventh Seraph or IKELOS weapon has a chance to drop a Warmind Cell. Multiple copies of this mod do not stack.

perks.name: Global Reach
perks.description: Warmind Cells you create affect and damage targets at a greater distance.

179977573.name: Blessing of Rasputin
179977573.tooltip: Defeating a combatant with a Seventh Seraph or IKELOS weapon has a chance to drop a Warmind Cell. Multiple copies of this mod do not stack.

perks.name: Blessing of Rasputin
perks.description: Collecting a Warmind Cell increases the chances that your next final blow with a Seraph weapon will create a Warmind Cell.

179977574.name: Light of the Fire
179977574.tooltip: Defeating a combatant with a Seventh Seraph or IKELOS weapon has a chance to drop a Warmind Cell. Multiple copies of this mod do not stack.

perks.name: Light of the Fire
perks.description: Rapidly defeating targets with the detonation of a Warmind Cell generates an Orb of Power.

179977575.name: Warmind's Light
179977575.tooltip: Defeating a combatant with a Seventh Seraph or IKELOS weapon has a chance to drop a Warmind Cell. Multiple copies of this mod do not stack.

perks.name: Warmind's Light
perks.description: Become Charged with Light by collecting a Warmind Cell.

179977568.name: Grasp of the Warmind
179977568.tooltip: Defeating a combatant with a Seventh Seraph or IKELOS weapon has a chance to drop a Warmind Cell. Multiple copies of this mod do not stack.

perks.name: Grasp of the Warmind
perks.description: You can pick up, carry, and throw Warmind Cells. Once thrown, a Warmind Cell cannot be picked up again.

1789319806.name: Modular Lightning
1789319806.tooltip: Defeating a combatant with a Seventh Seraph or IKELOS weapon has a chance to drop a Warmind Cell. Multiple copies of this mod do not stack.

perks.name: Modular Lightning
perks.description: Collecting a Warmind Cell creates a burst of chaining Arc energy around you.

1789319807.name: Strength of Rasputin
1789319807.tooltip: Defeating a combatant with a Seventh Seraph or IKELOS weapon has a chance to drop a Warmind Cell. Multiple copies of this mod do not stack.

perks.name: Strength of Rasputin
perks.description: Collecting a Warmind Cell grants you melee energy.

1789319804.name: Sheltering Energy
1789319804.tooltip: Defeating a combatant with a Seventh Seraph or IKELOS weapon has a chance to drop a Warmind Cell. Multiple copies of this mod do not stack.

perks.name: Sheltering Energy
perks.description: Collecting a Warmind Cell grants you an overshield.

1789319805.name: Chosen of the Warmind

perks.name: Chosen of the Warmind
perks.description: Collecting or destroying a Warmind Cell creates a concussive blast that pushes enemies away.

perks.name: Chosen of the Warmind
perks.description: Collecting or destroying a Warmind Cell creates a concussive blast that pushes enemies away.

perks.name: Burning Cells
perks.description: Destroying a Warmind Cell creates a burst of Solar energy that causes enemies to burn for several seconds.

2216063961.name: Fireteam Medic
2216063961.tooltip: Defeating a combatant with a Seventh Seraph or IKELOS weapon has a chance to drop a Warmind Cell. Multiple copies of this mod do not stack.

perks.name: Fireteam Medic
perks.description: Destroying a Warmind Cell creates a burst of healing for you and allies near you.

2216063960.name: Rage of the Warmind
2216063960.tooltip: Defeating a combatant with a Seventh Seraph or IKELOS weapon has a chance to drop a Warmind Cell. Multiple copies of this mod do not stack.

perks.name: Rage of the Warmind
perks.description: Adds additional Solar damage to the explosions of Warmind Cells you destroy.

2216063967.name: Incinerating Light
2216063967.tooltip: Defeating a combatant with a Seventh Seraph or IKELOS weapon has a chance to drop a Warmind Cell. Multiple copies of this mod do not stack.

perks.name: Incinerating Light
perks.description: Become Charged with Light by rapidly defeating multiple enemies with the explosion of a Warmind Cell.

2597888510.name: Cellular Suppression
2597888510.tooltip: Defeating a combatant with a Seventh Seraph or IKELOS weapon has a chance to drop a Warmind Cell. Multiple copies of this mod do not stack.

perks.name: Cellular Suppression
perks.description: Damaging a Warmind Cell creates a burst of suppressing Void energy. Additionally, you deal less damage to Warmind Cells.

perks.name: Cellular Suppression

2597888511.name: Power of Rasputin
2597888511.tooltip: Defeating a combatant with a Seventh Seraph or IKELOS weapon has a chance to drop a Warmind Cell. Multiple copies of this mod do not stack.

perks.name: Power of Rasputin

2597888508.name: Warmind's Protection
2597888508.tooltip: Defeating a combatant with a Seventh Seraph or IKELOS weapon has a chance to drop a Warmind Cell. Multiple copies of this mod do not stack.

perks.name: Warmind's Protection

2597888509.name: Warmind's Longevity
2597888509.tooltip: Defeating a combatant with a Seventh Seraph or IKELOS weapon has a chance to drop a Warmind Cell. Multiple copies of this mod do not stack.

perks.name: Warmind's Longevity
perks.description: Warmind Cells you create last longer.

2597888506.name: Light from Darkness
2597888506.tooltip: Defeating a combatant with a Seventh Seraph or IKELOS weapon has a chance to drop a Warmind Cell. Multiple copies of this mod do not stack.

perks.name: Light from Darkness
perks.description: Become Charged with Light by rapidly defeating multiple enemies near a Warmind Cell using weapons or abilities.

2979815164.name: Swift Charge
2979815164.tooltip: This mod's secondary perk is active when at least one other Arc mod is socketed into this armor, or when at least one other Arc Charged With Light mod is socketed into another piece of armor you are wearing.

perks.name: Swift Charge
perks.description: Become Charged with Light by rapidly defeating combatants with Pulse Rifles, Sidearms, or Submachine Guns.

perks.name: Pulse Rifle Scavenger
perks.description: Defeating combatants with a Pulse Rifle grants a chance to drop Special ammo for your allies.

2979815165.name: Lucent Blade
2979815165.tooltip: This mod's secondary perk is active when at least one other Arc mod is socketed into this armor, or when at least one other Arc Charged With Light mod is socketed into another piece of armor you are wearing.

perks.name: Lucent Blade
perks.description: While Charged with Light, dealing damage with a Sword gives you bonus Sword damage for 5 seconds, consuming one stack of Charged with Light.

perks.name: Replenishing Guard
perks.description: Greatly increases the charge rate for your equipped Swords.

2979815166.name: Reactive Pulse
2979815166.tooltip: This mod's secondary perk is active when at least one other Arc mod is socketed into this armor, or when at least one other Arc Charged With Light mod is socketed into another piece of armor you are wearing.

perks.name: Reactive Pulse
perks.description: While Charged with Light, when you take damage while surrounded by combatants, you emit a burst of damaging Arc energy, consuming one stack of Charged with Light.

perks.name: Finisher Bulwark
perks.description: Gain a powerful overshield while performing your finisher.

2979815167.name: Radiant Light
2979815167.tooltip: This mod's secondary perk is active when at least one other Arc mod is socketed into this armor, or when at least one other Arc Charged With Light mod is socketed into another piece of armor you are wearing.

perks.name: Radiant Light
perks.description: Casting your Super causes nearby allies to become Charged with Light.

perks.name: Stat Increase
perks.description: +20 Strength ▲

4272180933.name: Sustained Charge
4272180933.tooltip: This mod's effects stack with other copies of this mod.

perks.name: Sustained Charge
perks.description: Become Charged with Light by rapidly defeating combatants with Auto Rifles, Trace Rifles, or Machine Guns. Additional copies of this mod increase the time allowed between combatants that are defeated.

4272180932.name: Argent Ordnance
4272180932.tooltip: This mod's effects stack with other copies of this mod.

perks.name: Argent Ordnance
perks.description: While Charged with Light, readying or firing a Rocket Launcher grants it increased damage and reload speed. Damaging a combatant with a rocket consumes one stack of Charged with Light.

4272180935.name: Kindling the Flame
4272180935.tooltip: This mod's effects stack with other copies of this mod.

perks.name: Kindling the Flame
perks.description: While Charged with Light, reviving a downed Guardian gives you a burst of healing, consuming one stack of Charged with Light.

4272180934.name: Supercharged
4272180934.tooltip: This mod's effects stack with other copies of this mod.

perks.name: Supercharged
perks.description: You can have 2 additional stacks of Charged with Light, up to a maximum of 5.

2263321584.name: Precision Charge
2263321584.tooltip: This mod imposes a stat penalty when socketed in exchange for a reduced energy cost.

perks.name: Precision Charge
perks.description: Become Charged with Light by rapidly defeating combatants with precision kills from Bows, Hand Cannons, and Scout Rifles.

perks.name: Stat Penalty
perks.description: -10 Strength ▼

2263321585.name: Surprise Attack
2263321585.tooltip: This mod imposes a stat penalty when socketed in exchange for a reduced energy cost.

perks.name: Surprise Attack
perks.description: While Charged with Light, reloading or readying a Sidearm will consume all stacks of Charged with Light and convert them into stacks of a major damage buff, which are depleted as you damage combatants with that Sidearm.

perks.name: Stat Penalty
perks.description: -10 Intellect ▼

2263321586.name: Energy Converter
2263321586.tooltip: This mod imposes a stat penalty when socketed in exchange for a reduced energy cost.

perks.name: Energy Converter
perks.description: While Charged with Light, using your grenade attack grants you Super energy, consuming all stacks of Charged with Light. The more stacks you have, the more energy you gain, up to a maximum of 50% of your Super energy.

perks.name: Stat Penalty
perks.description: -10 Discipline ▼

2263321587.name: Charge Harvester
2263321587.tooltip: This mod imposes a stat penalty when socketed in exchange for a reduced energy cost.

perks.name: Charge Harvester
perks.description: While you are not Charged with Light, any kill or assist has a small cumulative chance to cause you to become Charged with Light.

perks.name: Stat Penalty
perks.description: -10 to the stat that governs your class ability recharge rate

3730619869.name: Elemental Charge
3730619869.tooltip: Picking up an elemental well grants energy to your ability with the lowest current energy. Picking up an elemental well whose element matches your subclass damage type grants energy to all of your abilities.

perks.description: Become Charged with Light by picking up an elemental well. If the elemental well's element type matches your subclass element, you gain 2 stacks of Charged with Light.

perks.name: Elemental Ordnance

perks.name: Font of Wisdom

1052528480.name: Shieldcrash Wellmaker
1052528480.tooltip: Picking up an elemental well grants energy to your ability with the lowest current energy. Picking up an elemental well whose element matches your subclass damage type grants energy to all of your abilities.

perks.name: Shieldcrash Wellmaker

1680735357.name: Well of Ions

perks.name: Well of Ions

825650462.name: Explosive Wellmaker

2164090163.name: Well of Life

3809244044.name: Well of Tenacity

4132945796.name: Blast Radius
4132945796.tooltip: This mod's effects stack with other copies of this mod.

2072507548.name: Argent Ordnance

perks.name: Argent Ordnance
perks.description: While Charged with Light, readying or firing a Rocket Launcher grants it increased damage and reload speed. Damaging a combatant with a rocket consumes one stack of Charged with Light.

2788876189.name: Hammer of the Warmind
2788876189.tooltip: Defeating a combatant with a Seventh Seraph or IKELOS weapon has a chance to drop a Warmind Cell. Multiple copies of this mod do not stack.

perks.name: Hammer of the Warmind
perks.description:
The detonations from Warmind Cells you destroy cause disruption, stunning combatants, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against   Overload Champions  and [Stagger]  Unstoppable Champions.

2142852459.name: Herd Thinner
2142852459.tooltip:
This mod's perks are only active in the "Deep Stone Crypt" raid.

Multiple copies of this mod stack and improve its effects.

817361141.name: Enhanced Operator Augment
817361141.tooltip:
This mod's perks are only active in the "Deep Stone Crypt" raid.

Multiple copies of this mod stack and improve its effects.

perks.name: Rapid Regen
perks.description: With the Operator Augment, you gain periodic bursts of healing when your health is depleted.

perks.name: Conversionist
perks.description: With no augment, collecting Orbs of Power causes you to periodically spawn Heavy ammo.

1578165808.name: Enhanced Scanner Augment
1578165808.tooltip:
This mod's perks are only active in the "Deep Stone Crypt" raid.

Multiple copies of this mod stack and improve its effects.

perks.name: Paint the Target
perks.description: With the scanner augment, powerful targets are marked by precision shots and take increased damage for a short period.

perks.name: Supercharged
perks.description: With no augment, you gain a bonus to Resilience and Recovery, and your class ability recharges faster.

1362793604.name: Enhanced Suppressor Augment
1362793604.tooltip:
This mod's perks are only active in the "Deep Stone Crypt" raid.

Multiple copies of this mod stack and improve its effects.

perks.name: Evasive Maneuvers
perks.description: With the Suppressor Augment, you take decreased damage from powerful foes.

perks.name: Stop, Stunnertime
perks.description: With no augment, grenades temporarily stun your targets.

3630287380.name: Enhanced Relay Defender
3630287380.tooltip: Active only in the "Garden of Salvation" raid.

perks.name: Enhanced Relay Defender

865380761.name: Enhanced Voltaic Mote Collector
865380761.tooltip: Active only in the "Garden of Salvation" raid.

perks.name: Enhanced Voltaic Mote Collector

2037533514.name: Enhanced Resistant Tether
2037533514.tooltip: Active only in the "Garden of Salvation" raid.

perks.name: Enhanced Resistant Tether
perks.description: Gain powerful damage resistance while part of a tether chain. Multiple copies of this mod stack to increase this benefit.

4020036031.name: Enhanced Voltaic Ammo Collector
4020036031.tooltip: Active only in the "Garden of Salvation" raid.

perks.name: Enhanced Voltaic Ammo Collector

3415291596.name: Relay Defender
3415291596.tooltip: Active only in the "Garden of Salvation" raid.

perks.name: Relay Defender
perks.description: Gain an increase to weapon damage while within 5 meters of an active Vex Relay. Multiple copies of this mod stack to increase this benefit.

4134680615.name: Voltaic Mote Collector

2887845822.name: Resistant Tether
2887845822.tooltip: Active only in the "Garden of Salvation" raid.

perks.name: Resistant Tether

perks.name: Taken Invigoration
